publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3157.1 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Central Scotland Police Headquarters-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3157) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, leave out from ", particularly" to end and insert "; recognises that the priority of the Physical Resources Sub-Committee of the joint board should be to ensure that the police buildings across the central Scotland area are of an appropriate standard, allowing officers to be even more effective in their work, and congratulates Central Scotland Police on their efforts towards the success of the Safer Central initiative, which has taken drugs to the value of over Â£260,000 off the streets of central Scotland and has led to a detection rate of 64%, one of the highest in the United Kingdom."
S1M-3157.1 Central Scotland Police Headquarters (lodged on 30 May 2002) Trish Godman*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Elaine Smith*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr John McAllion*, Scott Barrie*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-3157.1 Central Scotland Police Headquarters (lodged on 30 May 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*, Karen Gillon*
